name: logging-stack
title: Centralized Logging with Loki, Promtail & Grafana
description: Learn centralized logging by building a complete logging stack using Grafana Loki, Promtail, and Grafana for visualization.
learning_objectives: Set up Promtail for log collection
Create Grafana dashboards for log visualization
Write LogQL queries to analyze logs

tasks.name: Configure Loki
tasks.description: Set up Loki configuration for log storage

tasks.name: Configure Promtail
tasks.description: Set up Promtail to collect logs from containers

tasks.name: Start the Stack
tasks.description: Run docker-compose and verify all services are healthy

tasks.name: Query Logs
tasks.description: Use LogQL to query and filter logs in Grafana
